author: Simon Difford
description: Spirit-forward and just on the rich side, this late-night sipper delivers satisfying botanical complexity. If you're after a slightly larger serve suited to a coupe glass then try: 37.5ml (1¼oz) dry gin, 30ml (1oz) dry vermouth, 22.5 (¾oz) Bénédictine D.O.M., 1 dash absinthe, 1 dash aromatic bitters.
name: Minnie the Moocher

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
